parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the turret path the given vehicle's gunner is in. <tt>[-1]</tt> is returned if gunner is driver. When unit is not in any of vehicle's turret, empty array <tt>[]</tt> is returned. To get unit in turret see [[turretUnit]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[unitTurret]] gunner

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> gunner: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - turret path

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vehicle [[unitTurret]] _gunner;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[unitTurret]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[turretUnit]], [[driver]], [[gunner]], [[commander]], [[effectiveCommander]], [[currentPilot]], [[moveInTurret]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[lockedTurret]], [[isTurnedOut]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
